    #include <iostream>
    #include<cstdio>
    using namespace std;
    int t,n;
    int main()
    {
        scanf("%d",&t);
        while(t--)
        {
            scanf("%d",&n);
            if(n%2==0) printf("%d\n",n);
            else printf("%d\n",n-1);
        }
        return 0;
    }
